Let's Drink Hot Chocolate

    Cacao de Davao Tablea

    Posted on December 15, 2020

    Summary

    • Unit: 1 bar
    • Price:
    • Where:

    Score

    • Sweetness: 2
    • Thickness: 2
    • Overall: 2

    Prep

    • 1 cup (8-fl oz / 236 mL) full-fat milk
    • stirred and warmed to 68–70°C (154.4-158°F)

    Notes

    • A little bit chalky
    • Didn’t really like it
